ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: AUTestingRecords #11 Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT) Web Feature Service

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:AirborneSurveys
FeatureType.Title: Airborne Geophysical Surveys of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Spatial index of open file airborne geophysical surveys for which digital data is held.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:Boreholes
FeatureType.Title: Borehole Points of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Borehole features across Tasmania derived from the Borehole Database, administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania.

FeatureType.Name: gsmlp:BoreholeView
FeatureType.Title: Borehole Portrayal View of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: GeoSciML Portrayal Borehole View for NVCL Borehole Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT)

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:BoreholeTrace
FeatureType.Title: Borehole Traces of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)

FeatureType.Name: gsml:Borehole
FeatureType.Title: Boreholes of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: This feature describes the existence, location and associated metadata of drill holes contained within Tasmania.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:LicenceCategory1
FeatureType.Title: Category 1 Exploration Licence Polygons of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Category 1 Exploration Licence polygons and Exploration Release Areas across Tasmania, with tenement information derived from the Tasmanian Information on Geoscience and Exploration Resources (TIGER) system; administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT), Department of State Growth. Category 1 comprises any metallic mineral or atomic substance.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:LicenceCategory2
FeatureType.Title: Category 2 Exploration Licence Polygons of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Category 2 Exploration Licence polygons and Exploration Release Areas across Tasmania, with tenement information derived from the Tasmanian Information on Geoscience and Exploration Resources (TIGER) system; administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT), Department of State Growth. Category 2 comprises coal, peat, lignite, oil shale and coal seam gas.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:LicenceCategory3
FeatureType.Title: Category 3 Exploration Licence Polygons of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Category 3 Exploration Licence polygons and Exploration Release Areas across Tasmania, with tenement information derived from the Tasmanian Information on Geoscience and Exploration Resources (TIGER) system; administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT), Department of State Growth. Category 3 comprises any rock, stone, gravel, sand and clay used in construction, bricks and ceramics.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:LicenceCategory4
FeatureType.Title: Category 4 Exploration Licence Polygons of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Category 4 Exploration Licence polygons and Exploration Release Areas across Tasmania, with tenement information derived from the Tasmanian Information on Geoscience and Exploration Resources (TIGER) system; administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT), Department of State Growth. Category 4 comprises petroleum products except oil shale.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:LicenceCategory5
FeatureType.Title: Category 5 Exploration Licence Polygons of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: Category 5 Exploration Licence polygons and Exploration Release Areas across Tasmania, with tenement information derived from the Tasmanian Information on Geoscience and Exploration Resources (TIGER) system; administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT), Department of State Growth. Category 5 comprises, industrial minerals, prescribed precious stones, and prescribed semi-precious stone.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:LicenceCategory6
FeatureType.Title: Category 6 Exploration Licence Polygons of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Category 6 Exploration Licence polygons and Exploration Release Areas across Tasmania, with tenement information derived from the Tasmanian Information on Geoscience and Exploration Resources (TIGER) system; administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT), Department of State Growth. Category 6 is any geothermal substance.

FeatureType.Name: er:Commodity
FeatureType.Title: EarthResourceML commodities of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: Commodities of Tasmania provided by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT).

FeatureType.Name: er:MineralOccurrence
FeatureType.Title: EarthResourceML mineral occurrences of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: Mineral occurrences of Tasmania provided by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT).

FeatureType.Name: er:Mine
FeatureType.Title: EarthResourceML mines of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: Mines of Tasmania provided by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT).

FeatureType.Name: er:MiningActivity
FeatureType.Title: EarthResourceML mining activities of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: Mining activities of Tasmania provided by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT).

FeatureType.Name: er:MiningFeatureOccurrence
FeatureType.Title: EarthResourceML mining feature occurrences of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: Mining feature occurrences of Tasmania provided by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT).

FeatureType.Name: gsml:MappedFeature
FeatureType.Title: GeoSciML mapped features occurrences of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: GeoSciML mapped features of Tasmania provided by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT).

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:GravityBaseStations
FeatureType.Title: Gravity Base Stations of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Precise locations where the absolute value of gravity is known.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:GravityMeasurements
FeatureType.Title: Gravity Measurements of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Primary and derived (i.e. Bouguer anomaly) gravity observation points (stations) in Tasmania

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:DamagePoint
FeatureType.Title: Landslide Damage Points of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Point locations of known damage to structures or property caused by a landslide in Tasmania, with summary damage data derived from the Geohazards (Landslide) Database, administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:DamagePoly
FeatureType.Title: Landslide Damage Polygons of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Polygons of structures or property known to be damaged by a landslide in Tasmania, with summary damage data derived from the Geohazards (Landslide) Database, administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:LandSlideLine
FeatureType.Title: Landslide Lines of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Linear landslide components of landslide features mapped across Tasmania, with summary landslide data derived from the Geohazards (Landslide) Database, administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:LandSlidePoint
FeatureType.Title: Landslide Points of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Landslide features across Tasmania as representative points, with summary landslide data derived from the Geohazards (Landslide) Database; administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:LandSlidePoly
FeatureType.Title: Landslide Polygons of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Landslide component polygons of landslide features mapped across Tasmania, with summary landslide data derived from the Geohazards (Landslide) Database, administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:MineralOccurences
FeatureType.Title: Mineral Occurrence Points of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Mineral occurrences, including operating and abandoned mines, located in Tasmania, with summary mineral occurrence data, derived from the Mineral Occurrence Database, administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania.

FeatureType.Name: mo:MinOccView
FeatureType.Title: Mineral Occurrence Portrayal View of Tasmania (1.0)
FeatureType.Abstract: Earth Resource Mineral Occurrence Portrayal View provided by Mineral Resources Tasmania from the TIGER database.

FeatureType.Name: mt:MineralTenement
FeatureType.Title: Mineral Tenement of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: This is a simple web service to deliver mineral tenements (permits, licences, leases) using MineralTenementML provided by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT).. More information on http://schemas.geoscience.gov.au/MineralTenementML/1.0/.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:Leases
FeatureType.Title: Mining Lease Polygons of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Mining Lease polygons and production licence polygons for all mineral categories across Tasmania, with tenement information derived from the Tasmanian Information on Geoscience and Exploration Resources (TIGER) system; administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT), Department of State Growth.

FeatureType.Name: sa:SamplingFeatureCollection
FeatureType.Title: NVCL TSA Results of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: This feature contains a series of observations and measurements made at regular intervals along a drill core or spatially associated drill chips. The observations comprise suggested mineralogical interpretations generated with "The Spectral Assistant (TSA)" algorithm on visible and shortwave-infrared reflectance spectra and filtered by experienced analysts. The observations are represented as mineral species and mineral group predictions by name with associated weights (proportions). Proportions are only relative to the sum of the SWIR or VNIR spectral-active minerals sensed and are NOT modal abundances. This feature is provided as a guide only and should be validated by the user using other methods.

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:ProclaimedAreasPoly
FeatureType.Title: Proclaimed Landslip Areas of Tasmania (Mineral Resources Tasmania)
FeatureType.Abstract: Proclaimed Landslip Areas (A and B) of Tasmania, which are defined under the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995, administered by Mineral Resources Tasmania. These areas prohibit or restrict building and other activities in particular areas of unstable land, as specified under the Building Act 2000.

FeatureType.Name: nvcl:ScannedBoreholeCollection
FeatureType.Title: Scanned Borehole Collection of Tasmania
FeatureType.Abstract: Scanned Borehole Collection Mineral Resources Tasmania (MRT)

FeatureType.Name: mrtwfs:StrategicProspectivityZones
FeatureType.Title: Strategic Prospectivity Zones
